title: Node finishes syncing but reports it is still syncing, can't run validator
body:
**Description**
My node got stuck on a block and I had to resync. After finishing the resync, the node still reports as syncing, and thus the validator can't run.

Please provide the following information regarding your setup:
 - Operating System: Debian
 
 Rocket Pool service version: 1.11.0
Selected Eth 1.0 client: Nethermind (Locally managed)
    Image: nethermind/nethermind:1.21.1
Selected Eth 2.0 client: Lodestar (Locally managed)
    Image: chainsafe/lodestar:v1.10.0

**Additional context**
I can't validate and am currently being slashed.

**Logs**
Please include any relevant logs that may help identify the issue.
nethermind logs:
`rocketpool_eth1  | 27 Oct 15:36:14 | No incoming messages from the consensus client that is required for sync. 
rocketpool_eth1  | 27 Oct 15:36:15 | Received new block:  18442477 (0x43c5df...513835) 
rocketpool_eth1  | 27 Oct 15:36:15 | Syncing... Inserting block 18442477 (0x43c5df...513835). 
rocketpool_eth1  | 27 Oct 15:36:15 | Received ForkChoice: Head: 18442477 (0x43c5df...513835), Safe: 18442422 (0xb0f647...2670fd), Finalized: 18442390 (0xd8d7d8...e2bf33) 
rocketpool_eth1  | 27 Oct 15:36:15 | Syncing beacon headers, Request: ForkChoice: Head: 18442477 (0x43c5df...513835), Safe: 18442422 (0xb0f647...2670fd), Finalized: 18442390 (0xd8d7d8...e2bf33) 
rocketpool_eth1  | 27 Oct 15:36:15 | Changing state StateNodes to FastSync, StateNodes at processed: 0 | state: 0 | block: 18442444 | header: 18442444 | target block: 18442477 | peer block: 18442477 
rocketpool_eth1  | 27 Oct 15:36:15 | Sync mode changed from StateNodes to FastSync, StateNodes 
rocketpool_eth1  | 27 Oct 15:36:16 | Changing state FastSync, StateNodes to StateNodes at processed: 0 | state: 0 | block: 18442445 | header: 18442445 | target block: 18442477 | peer block: 18442477 
rocketpool_eth1  | 27 Oct 15:36:16 | Sync mode changed from FastSync, StateNodes to StateNodes 
rocketpool_eth1  | 27 Oct 15:36:17 | State Sync 00.04:08:24 | ~0.01 % |   9.40 MB / ~174350.00 MB | branches: 0.00 % | kB/s:     7 | accounts 10186 | nodes 33159 | diagnostics: 22.49395187.53ms 
^Crocketpool_eth1  | 27 Oct 15:36:19 | State Sync 00.04:08:26 | ~0.01 % |   9.42 MB / ~174350.00 MB | branches: 0.00 % | kB/s:    15 | accounts 10211 | nodes 33246 | diagnostics: 22.49417941.51ms 
rocketpool_eth1  | 27 Oct 15:36:19 | No incoming messages from the consensus client that is required for sync.`
 lodestar logs:
`rocketpool_eth2  | Oct-27 15:10:53.001[]                 info: Synced - slot: 7632952 - head: 0xeaae…25b5 - exec-block: syncing(18442351 0x4ada…) - finalized: 0xe34b…6dae:238527 - peers: 47
rocketpool_eth2  | Oct-27 15:11:05.001[]                 info: Synced - slot: 7632953 - head: 0xea3d…e797 - exec-block: syncing(18442352 0xcd4e…) - finalized: 0xe34b…6dae:238527 - peers: 47
rocketpool_eth2  | Oct-27 15:11:17.001[]                 info: Synced - slot: 7632954 - head: 0x4958…eb68 - exec-block: syncing(18442353 0x4965…) - finalized: 0xe34b…6dae:238527 - peers: 47
rocketpool_eth2  | Oct-27 15:11:29.001[]                 info: Synced - slot: 7632955 - head: 0x54e0…8eb8 - exec-block: syncing(18442354 0x70e1…) - finalized: 0xe34b…6dae:238527 - peers: 47
rocketpool_eth2  | Oct-27 15:11:41.001[]                 info: Synced - slot: 7632956 - head: 0x6600…b282 - exec-block: syncing(18442355 0x1f0a…) - finalized: 0xe34b…6dae:238527 - peers: 47
rocketpool_eth2  | Oct-27 15:11:53.001[]                 info: Synced - slot: 7632957 - head: 0xaa6f…ac39 - exec-block: syncing(18442356 0x3d2f…) - finalized: 0xe34b…6dae:238527 - peers: 48
rocketpool_eth2  | Oct-27 15:12:05.000[]                 info: Synced - slot: 7632958 - head: 0x085c…024a - exec-block: syncing(18442357 0xdafa…) - finalized: 0xe34b…6dae:238527 - peers: 48
rocketpool_eth2  | Oct-27 15:12:17.126[]                 info: Synced - slot: 7632959 - head: 0xb654…4d20 - exec-block: syncing(18442358 0xfe68…) - finalized: 0xe34b…6dae:238527 - peers: 48
rocketpool_eth2  | Oct-27 15:12:29.076[]                 info: Synced - slot: 7632960 - head: (slot -1) 0xb654…4d20 - exec-block: syncing(18442358 0xfe68…) - finalized: 0x9bd5…7f97:238528 - peers: 48
`
validator logs:
`rocketpool_validator  | Oct-27 15:27:14.101[]                 warn: Node is syncing - Error producing attestation - Service Unavailable: Node is syncing - Block's execution payload not yet validated, executionPayloadBlockHash=0xb0f6476d8243f41df65b03f642ad9afd899c8262a6539064fb274a5f222670fd number=18442422
rocketpool_validator  | Oct-27 15:31:14.398[]                 warn: Node is syncing - Error producing attestation - Service Unavailable: Node is syncing - Block's execution payload not yet validated, executionPayloadBlockHash=0xb0f6476d8243f41df65b03f642ad9afd899c8262a6539064fb274a5f222670fd number=18442422
rocketpool_validator  | Oct-27 15:32:26.231[]                 warn: Node is syncing - Error producing attestation - Service Unavailable: Node is syncing - Block's execution payload not yet validated, executionPayloadBlockHash=0xe3335eeffd999c77fce2a7fab84763f64c59d05d4dae25d06b1f6f9c0c3007b8 number=18442454`

I think there was a regression in the logging in 1.21 -- when I rolled back to 1.20, I could see the progress of the state sync `State Sync 00.05:07:07 | ~0.08 % |  97.33 MB / ~129760.00 MB | ` but not in 1.21
